FAIL_TO_PASS: when argument then included in helpInformation
when just help command then returns length of help term
when program has subcommands then has automatic help command
when program has command with optional arg then appears in help
when argument described then included in helpInformation
styleUsage
when multiple commands then returns longest length
styleArgumentText
when argument described with default then included in helpInformation
styleSubcommandText
styleArgumentTerm
when has argument description then returns argument length
when arguments described in deprecated way and empty description then arguments still included in helpInformation
when argument term longest return argument length
styleSubcommandDescription
when command with arg and no help then returns length of term
styleSubcommandTerm
when program has no subcommands and add help command then has help command
when has multiple argument descriptions then returns longest
when arguments described in deprecated way then included in helpInformation
